author: The B1M
description:
Tajikistan is finally finishing a Soviet-era megaproject.
Download the Straight Arrow News app by clicking here https://www.san.com/b1m to stay informed with unbiased, straight facts.

Full story here - https://www.theb1m.com/video/building-the-world-s-tallest-megadam

Additional footage and images courtesy of RogunHPP and WeBuild.

00:00 Intro
01:07 Soviet mega build
04:06 1976
09:21 Why the dam stalled
12:06 How to earthquake-proof a megadam
14:20 Diverting the river
15:28 Constructing the dam
17:05 Conclusion

For more by The B1M subscribe now - https://bit.ly/the-b1m

title: The World's Tallest Megadam Will Block Central Asia
